\doxysubsection*{A scripting language for Sys Admins}\hypertarget{index_autotoc_md26}{}\doxysubsection{Introduction}\label{index_autotoc_md26}
Luna was developed here at Gymate for use on our backend servers. Shell scripts are combersome and environment dependent and Python/\+Ruby/\+Lua offer too much out of the box for simple system scripting. Luna intends to fill that gap and provide network and system professionals with the best tool for the job.\hypertarget{index_autotoc_md27}{}\doxysubsection{Getting Started}\label{index_autotoc_md27}

\end{DoxyItemize}
